title: Prehistoric Annie
body: I found my old triceratops (Trike) teddy bear and straight away thought of annie. Imagine prehistoric annie, holding a green triceratops teddy bear. {{champion:1}}

replies.body:

>
> so what would {{champion:1}}  look like?

a fetus
nah, shed be made of dino bones cause in dino age there where no cave men, so shed be made of bones and she uses like marrow for her spells

feels good to have post makers approval :D

Fire Discovery Annie.

Throwing flaming branches and dressed in skins, Tibbers showing up as a tall T-rex, and throwing Pebbles references left and right.
